attributes.action: persuade Steve McClaren to reinstate David Beckham into the England National Football Team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to England's recent dire performances the time has come to recall David Beckham back into the England National Football team and with it qualification for Euro 2008.  Additionally, it will provide this great nation of ours with something to cheer about again!  Bring Back Goldenballs!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
